Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 100th overall pick, by Coney Island in 1975...
Injured on 4/6/1976 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/31/1978 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/26/1981 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/18/1981, off Augustine Lucero (DIA)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/28/1981, off David Trinkle (CC)...
Traded from Coney Island to Boston (UBA) on 7/8/1984 (Going to PIL: P J. Moon, SS E. Mcinerney. Going to CI: P G. Figuera, P A. Saad, P J. Zwick, P D. Kleiber)...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
